articles.content: Bollywood star-kid Taimur Ali Khan celebrated his 7th birthday at the Pataudi Palace in Haryana. Proud parents Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor Khanhosted an intimate gathering, attended by close fam… [+1248 chars]

articles.title: Sam Bahadur box office collection day 20: Vicky Kaushal’s film holds its ground before Shah Rukh Khan’s Dunki takes over - The Indian Express
articles.description: Sam Bahadur box office collection day 20: Despite the challenge posed by Ranbir Kapoor's Animal, Vicky Kaushal's film has maintained a steady pace, with its total domestic collections standing at Rs 81 crore.
articles.content: In the face of stiff competition, the Vicky Kaushal-starrer Sam Bahadur has displayed remarkable resilience at the box office since its release on December 1. Despite the challenge posed by Ranbir Ka… [+1383 chars]

articles.title: World Saree Day 2023: Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Tamannaah Bhatia to Rashmika Mandanna, South Indian Actresses Who Slayed the Look - News18 - News18
articles.description: The saree, a timeless Indian garment cherished globally, transcends borders as the most beloved attire for women. Its timeless beauty has captivated hearts for generations, turning any woman into a vision of allure, loveliness, and enduring style.
articles.content: TAMANNAAH BHATIA: Tamannaah Bhatia effortlessly redefined festive fashion in a stunning sequin-laden Manish Malhotra saree. The floor-length attire, embellished with multi-colored, ice blue, and pink… [+276 chars]

articles.title: Warner Bros. Is in Talks to Merge With Paramount Global - Bloomberg
articles.description: Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. held talks on a possible merger with Paramount Global, potentially combining two of the biggest media companies in the world, according to people with knowledge of the matter.
